description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
If it's dead or gone, deal 1 to the enemy Nexus instead.
flavorText: Gangplank's cruelty doesn't end with those who wrong him. To make an enemy of the Saltwater Scourge is to bring death upon everyone you hold dear.
name: Cannon Barrage
